text: The Haunted Hotel is a 1907 American silent comedy movie directed by J. Stuart BlacktonThe Haunted HotelTHE HAUNTED HOTEL and stars Paul Panzer and William V. Ranous. ==Actors== * Paul Panzer as The Traveller * William V. Ranous as The Waiter ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movies Category:1907 movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies
title: The Haunted Hotel
